Others: The Minnesota Twins gained ground in the AL Wild Card standings after beating the Los Angeles Angels on Wednesday night.
The Twins scored 16 runs over the last two games, which comes on the heels of the team getting outscored 17-4.
Minnesota trails the Kansas City Royals in both the AL Central race and the Wild Card picture.
The Twins head into a weekend series against the Reds just 1.5 games out of the No. 5 seed.
The playoff race is tightening up in a big way as the final weeks of the season arrive.
